nodes.excerpt: Designing for the web is awesome until we need our designs to become non-web things â€“ then it gets complicated. Make.cm is an easy creative API that allows you to take your web design templates and convert them into ready to go API endpoints.
nodes.title: Make - Turn your web content into images and PDFs with our API

nodes.excerpt: https://passbase.com/ is an identity verification and https://passbase.com/aml-compliance that helps companies onboard users from over 190 countries and screen 6,000 government IDs. It can be integrated with no code at all or natively on https://docs.passbase.com/ and in check out flows in a matter of seconds.
nodes.title: Biometric Authentication by Passbase - Combining identity verification and secure user logins

nodes.excerpt: Hitman enables developers to collaborate, test and publish API documentations. Share your work in a dedicated workspace with real-time collaboration. Develop and Test your API simultaneously to ship reliable products swiftly.
nodes.title: Hitman.app - Collaboration tool to test APIs & publish beautiful API docs
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: We simplify encryption for developers. Encryption is hard to get right and very easy to get wrong, thatâ€™s why we built Ubiq, an entirely API-based SaaS platform that enables developers to build encryption directly into their applications with a few lines of code and 2 API calls.
nodes.title: Ubiq Security - Enable developers to build encryption into apps in minutes
nodes.author: Hwei Oh

nodes.excerpt: Method (YC S19) allows you to easily pay any of your users' debts â€“ including credits card, student loans, car loans, and mortgages â€“ all through a single API.
nodes.title: Method Financial - Embed debt repayment into your app in minutes.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Configure and deploy your own private, hosted API endpoints to process text, images, and other data using state-of-the-art machine learning in a few clicks. Chain together one or more models to efficiently process and extract insights from your data.
nodes.title: Pretrained AI - Integrate pretrained machine learning models in minutes.
nodes.author: Jacob Zweig

nodes.excerpt: Iconduck is a collection of 146 (and counting) open source icon and illustration sets. â € They can be searched through and downloaded, and are available for personal and commercial purposes (depending on the license, some may request a backlink).
nodes.title: Iconduck - 113,524 free open source icons & illustrations
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Alpaca Broker API allows us to offer each component of the brokerage service including opening accounts, booking money movements, giving out rewards, commission-free trading of U.S. stocks, fractional shares trading, and more.
nodes.title: Alpaca Broker API - Launch your own commission-free trading app
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Bolt One Click is a simple, streamlined checkout for shoppers that enables a one-click checkout anywhereâ€”no passwords, no usernames, no entering credit card numbers. The result? Shoppers convert at a 60% higher rateâ€”good for retailers and great for shoppers.
nodes.title: Bolt One Click - The simplest and fastest checkout experience for shoppers.

nodes.excerpt: A simple free tool + API to auto generate "cover images" on the fly - Twitter cards, Facebook "open graph" images etc.
nodes.title: Imgen by JitBit - Autogenerate social media thumbnails via a free API
nodes.author: Alex

nodes.excerpt: Balance Checkout is the first self-serve checkout that accepts all B2B payment needs. From net term financing to invoicing to checks, your B2B customers can finally pay how they want - with just a few clicks.
nodes.title: Balance Checkout - The first B2B checkout
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Calendso is the open source Calendly alternative. Self host it, or have it hosted by us. Integrate it seamlessly into your business with advanced customization and the open API. White-label by default, and designed to be a joy to use for you and your visitors.
nodes.title: Calendso - The open source Calendly alternative
nodes.author: Bailey Pumfleet

nodes.excerpt: ZujoNow Live SDK is a scalable live streaming API for the web, android, and iOS with the support of WebRTC, RTSP and RTMP and is compatible with OBS Studio, StreamYard OBS Studio, etc. ZujoNow Live helps you make your app more engaging and life much easier.
nodes.title: ZujoNow Live SDK - Simple yet powerful live video streaming API for developers

nodes.excerpt: BaseQL brings the power of GraphQL to Airtable, allowing you to query, filter and mutate records using a simple-yet-powerful Explorer. Integrate it easily with low-code and no-code applications! Join us on Slack: https://shorturl.at/nHR07
nodes.title: BaseQL - GraphQL for Airtable
nodes.author: Ben Orozco

nodes.excerpt: BackgroundCut is the fastest & easiest way to remove or replace any image's background. It uses Artificial Intelligence to analyze and cut out any image's background with a single click. Just upload your image and remove the background in under 5 seconds!
nodes.title: BackgroundCut - Remove image background automatically with AI
nodes.author: HARSH RANJAN

nodes.excerpt: Verifying user identities requires writing tedious, repetitive code, risking catastrophic security breaches ğŸ˜±. With NoPass.me, an open-source MFA verification solution, securely send and verify One-Time Passwords and ensure users are who they say they are!
nodes.title: NoPass.me - Open-source identity verification

nodes.excerpt: Generate a REST API with read + write endpoints on top of a sample dataset in less than 30 secs. Customize your dataset with dozens of datatypes. Built for testing, BI demo data, prototypes and more.
nodes.title: Mock API Generator - Generate custom data & API to build apps in less than 30s
nodes.author: Jamie Cuffe

nodes.excerpt: Backprop is an API/platform that makes enhancing software with machine learning simple. With powerful out-of-the-box models, easy custom uploads, scalable infrastructure, and an affordable pricing scheme, Backprop has everything you need.
nodes.title: Backprop - Serverless machine learning API for every developer
nodes.author: Owen LaCava

nodes.excerpt: Analyze reviews with enriched company profiles from 85+ review sites in one place.
nodes.title: Datashake - Turning scraped data into intelligent data
nodes.author: Jesseca Casanare

nodes.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
nodes.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes
nodes.author: Brandon Foo

nodes.excerpt: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate property investment analysis tool which helps you find the best investment opportunities nearby.
nodes.title: DataMool - Global predictive residential property investment analysis
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Streamâ€™s UI + SDKs for in-app chat allow you to build a beautiful and scalable chat experience in hours. 50+ handcrafted screens for Figma & Sketch. UI components for Flutter, React Native, Kotlin & Swift. Free maker accounts available for side projects.
nodes.title: Mobile Chat Kit - UI kits & sample apps for building in-app mobile chat
nodes.author: Alex Iskold

nodes.excerpt: API Connector is simple solution for data importing from any JSON API to Google Sheet, Airtable, & Webflow.
nodes.title: API Connector - Import JSON data into Google Sheet, Airtable, & Webflow
nodes.author: Mohd Danish

nodes.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
nodes.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API
nodes.author: Gregory Koberger
